price: Dan Allah, Dia-lah Yang mengirimkan angin, lalu angin itu menggerakkan awan, maka Kami halau awan itu ke suatu negeri yang mati, lalu Kami hidupkan bumi setelah matinya dengan hujan itu.  Demikianlah, kebangkitan itu.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَرۡسَلَ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ فَتُثِيرُ سَحَابٗا فَسُقۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ بَلَدٖ مَّيِّتٖ فَأَحۡيَيۡنَا بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلنُّشُورُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu alladhī arsala al-riyāḥa fatuthīru saḥāban fasuq'nāhu ilā baladin mayyitin fa-aḥyaynā bihi al-arḍa baʿda mawtihā kadhālika al-nushūru
